Package chess.core

Interface Summary
Constants Constants is an interface consisting of useful values.
 

Class Summary
Board Board is simply a chess board layout containing all piece positions
ChessDocuments ChessDocuments is a custom list model specific for ChessGames
ChessFile ChessFile can open an existing ChessGame or save a ChessGame
ChessFileFilter ChessFileFilter filters only the files with the recognized extension
ChessGame ChessGame contains all the necessary information for a chess game, such as the chess board, game and player parameters, timers, history, etc.
ChessListModel ChessListModel is a custom list model specific for Move's
ChessTableModel ChessTableModel is a custom table model specific for Move's to display move Notation
ComponentList ComponentList is a custom JList (eg.
Computer Computer is a thread that undergoes the 'moving a piece' process.
Coord Coord contains x and y coordinates for a piece's location in column and row, respectively.
CustomCellRenderer CustomCellRenderer is a custom cell renderer for a JTable.
DocumentThumbnail DocumentThumbnail displays a thumbnail visualization of a chess game DocumentThumbnail's are used by ChessDocumentView
FlatButton FlatButton is a custom button in vertical left-top orientation
ImageManipulator ImageManipulator is used to manipulate an image, such as brighten or darken the image.
InfoLabel The info label is used by a DocumentThumbnail containing some player and game info, such as the player name, timer and the last move of the game.
Move Move contains the two coordinates for piece from and to location.
PGN  
Piece Piece represents a chess piece
PieceCounts PieceCounts is used by ChessGame.
PlayerLabel PlayerLabel is a label put above or below the main chess board to provide player info, such as player name and timer.
VirtualClock VirtualClock is a timer for the amount of time a player has left to move.
VisualClock VisualClock displays a visual form of a VirtualClock
